title: Need help with opening launcher
body: The new alpha client thing has always been really buggy for me. So recently when I tried to launch the Legacy client, It'd shut me off every time so what i tried to do was uninstall, but now it wont work at all. When i open it, the icon appears for 1 sec and then it instantly says something went wrong while opening it so I tried doing it with Administrator and when it finished doing all its updates, It says "League of Legends has encountered a problem. Please re-install League alpha client to try again later." Is there anything i can do to fix this?

replies.body:
The error you're running into usually means that something went really wrong during your reinstallation or patching process. The most common solution for this error is to complete a clean reinstallation of League by following [**this guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends).

Let me know if this worked for you.
